front.title: Hybird Fordwarding of Computing-Aware Traffic Steering (CATS)

abstract.t: This document proposes a hybrid forwarding mechanism for CATS (Computing-Aware Traffic Steering). The mechanism integrates the CATS forwarding table with the IP forwarding table, optimizing the utilization of forwarding table capacity. By customizing the forwarding model based on service identifiers, it can accommodate both experience-sensitive and non-experience-sensitive services. Additionally, it supports flow-granularity load balancing, enhancing the utilization of computing and networking resources while ensuring differentiated service requirements are satisfied.
